top.title: FBI releases images of masked person in hunt for Savannah Guthrie's mother
top.summary: The mother of the news anchor Savannah disappeared in the middle of night from her Tucson, Arizona, home and was last seen on 31 January.

top.title: US lawmakers accuse justice department of 'inappropriately' redacting Epstein files
top.summary: Republican Thomas Massie and Democrat Ro Khanna say the DOJ is not complying with their transparency law.

top.title: Macron urges Europe to start acting like world power
top.summary: The French president warns of growing threats from China, Russia and now the US, saying Europe faces a "wake-up call".

top.title: Apple and Google agree to change app stores after 'effective duopoly' claim
top.summary: The UK's markets regulator says the proposed commitments "will boost the UK's app economy".

top.title: Instagram and YouTube owners built 'addiction machines', trial hears
top.summary: The tech giants are under scrutiny over social media addiction in a landmark jury trial in Los Angeles

top.title: Discord to start requiring face scan or ID to access adult content
top.summary: The online chat service, which has 200 million monthly users, will blur adult content by default.

title.#text: Sharge’s new power bank can charge two laptops while putting on a light show
Facebook can animate your profile pic with AI
An Ark showed me augmented reality’s true artistic potential
